description: Detect standard users login that are part of high privileged groups such as the Administrator group
author: frack113
false_positives: Standard domain users who are part of the administrator group. These users shouldn't have these right. But in the case where it's necessary. They should be filtered out using the "TargetUserName" field
name: Standard User In High Privileged Group
query: ((winlog.event_id:"300" AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserSid:S\-1\-5\-21\-* AND SidList:(*S\-1\-5\-32\-544* OR *\-500\}* OR *\-518\}* OR *\-519\}*)) AND (NOT winlog.event_data.TargetUserSid:(*\-500 OR *\-518 OR *\-519)))
